title: misc/emacs: uncomment-region doesn't work
body:
by **ryanb@google.com**: 
hi! i'll probably look at fixing this in 20% time soon if no one else gets to it first.

What steps will reproduce the problem?

highlight a commented region, then press M-; or run M-x uncomment-region.

What is the expected output?

the region is uncommented.

What do you see instead?

error message: "can't find the comment end"

this is using go-mode.el from dc5e410f0b4c weekly/weekly.2012-03-27,  gnu emacs 23.2.1,
goobuntu 10.04.
